clinical_study.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics of Fondaparinux in Patients With Major Orthopedic Surgery
clinical_study.official_title: Population Pharmacokinetics of Fondaparinux Administered at Prophylactic Doses After Major Orthopedic Surgery in Everyday Practice

lead_sponsor.agency: Centre Hospitalier Universitaire de Saint Etienne

clinical_study.source: Centre Hospitalier Universitaire de Saint Etienne

brief_summary.textblock: Fondaparinux is a synthetic antithrombotic agent with specific anti-factor Xa activity. A population pharmacokinetic model of fondaparinux, based on data obtained in patients included in phase II/III trials, has been described. However, the validity of this model in everyday practice needed to be confirmed. This study was a multicenter, prospective cohort study in consecutive orthopedic patients treated with 2.5 mg of fondaparinux. Anti-Xa activities were recorded in 809 patients. Population parameters and inter-individual variability were estimated using NONMEM VI software. A two-compartment model with first-order absorption best described fondaparinux pharmacokinetics. Covariates partly explaining inter-individual variability were body weight, age and creatinine clearance estimated by the simplified Modification of Diet in Renal Disease formula. A body weight less than 50 kg and moderate renal failure increased drug exposure. These results suggest that fondaparinux pharmacokinetics need to be confirmed in patient populations not fully assessed in phase II/III studies

primary_outcome.measure: To determine an anti-Xa activity value which is predicted of a haemorrhage risk

arm_group.description: Patients with major orthopedic surgery and prophylactic doses of fondaparinux who have 3 blood sample during their hospitalization to measure anti-Xa activity

study_pop.textblock: patients with major orthopedic surgery who need prophylactic doses of fondaprinux

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patient who need leg major orthopedic surgery
- age > 18 years
- patient who need prophylactic doses of fondaparinux
Exclusion Criteria:
- contra-indication to fondaparinux
- renal insufficiency
